SELECT d.dno,d.`explain`,d.avatar,d.count,d.dname,d.groupCount,cd.clockDay,cd.allClockAfter,cd.allClockMorning,c.clockTime,count(DISTINCT c.employeno)as clockNum from clockemploye c,depall d,clockdepall cd WHERE to_days(c.clockTime) =to_days(NOW()) AND type="上午" AND c.dno=d.dno AND c.dno=cd.dno AND to_days(cd.clockDay) =to_days(NOW()) GROUP BY c.dno
